title: 1.5.2 Forge & LiteLoader VoxelMod 整合測試（作弊向）
author: kenvsgun
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kenvsgun 于 2013-5-20 19:08 编辑 

Mod列表（共24個，附上原帖地址）：
LiteLoader http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/467504-152-macro-keybind-mod-099-and-liteloader-for-152/Forge ModLoader http://www.minecraftforge.net/ThebombzenAPI http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/753030-152-thebombzens-mods/OptiFine http://optifine.net/Language InputFix （輸入修正）http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-83941-1-1.htmlVoxelMenu （介面優化）http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackVoxelFlight （飛行等）http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackAutoSwitch （自動切換工具）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/753030-152-thebombzens-mods/EnchantView （附魔預覽）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/753030-152-thebombzens-mods/MobAura （自動攻擊）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/753030-152-thebombzens-mods/VoxelWorld （世界設定）http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackVoxelTextures （材質更換介面優化）http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackMacro/Keybind Mod （快捷鍵等）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/467504-152-macro-keybind-mod-099-and-liteloader-for-152/ChatBubbles （聊天泡泡）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1116564-152-mamiyaotarus-mods-voxelmap-chatbubbles-autofarmer-etc/VoxelGet （類TMI）http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackVoxelMap （Zan的小地圖）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1116564-152-mamiyaotarus-mods-voxelmap-chatbubbles-autofarmer-etc/Animated Player （玩家動作及細節補充）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1768057-152aesthetic-animated-player-fully-pixelized-hats-v120/Shoulder Surfing Mod （第三人稱修正）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1619637-152forge-shoulder-surfing-modded-third-person-camera/InventoryTweaks （物品整理）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1720872-15x-inventory-tweaks-154-may-1/VoxelSniperGUI （GUI設定）http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1012026-132smp-jimmynators-mods-september-4-researchcraft-v10-working-as-expected/VoxelVisualiser http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackVoxelBoards http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPackWorldEdit CUI http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/885099-mc-146-we-54-cui-gui-visualizer-for-worldedit-v146/VoxelLib http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/The_VoxelModPack


下載地址：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=530219&uk=1176272235
